SELECT bno ,title ,user ,content ,date_format(regdate,'%Y-%m-%d') as regdate ,view ,fixtop FROM board
WHERE title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWrd} ,'%')
WHERE content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWrd} ,'%')
WHERE( title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWrd} ,'%') or content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWrd} ,'%') )
ORDER BY fixtop DESC, bno DESC LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}
